title: What can I do when my teachers ignore me? - Quora

response.answer_text: What do I do when all of the teachers are ignoring me? I would try to stand out or do what I did I actually accidentally had my hair which I bleached but someone it turned several different colors of the rainbow and my teacher brought it up to me because stood out from the others. It was embarrassing since I am an introvert and didn’t want to bring attention to myself. However, consider your clothes or something amusing so you can stand out in front of the class so teachers can see you this time. If they ask why are you dressed this way or have something on your head, “I would say, “ wanted to get your attention!”
